meanings.definition: In a way that pertains to the instinctual energy or force associated with sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The music pulsed libidinally, stirring up excitement in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The dancer moved libidinally, expressing raw emotion through movement.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail libidinally, eager to play with its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged libidinally, unleashing its power on the town.
meanings.sent5: The engine roared libidinally, propelling the car forward with speed.
